class_notes: of the Old Testament II (Prerequisite for MDiv and Special/NonDegree students: OT 501 or equivalent) (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions Wednesdays 3:00pm-5:00pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description:
Introduction to the Latter Prophets and the Writings, with attention to the cultural context
of ancient Israel and the interpretation of Old Testament poetic literature.
prerequisites: This requirement mandates OT501 or equivalent as a prerequisite for MDiv and Non-degree students.
sections: Class Nbr: 1767, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 3-5p, Instructor: R. Bonfiglio, Status: Open
